primary_structure_type: large semi-aquatic reptile with armored scales
primary_structure_surface: keeled dorsal scutes, smooth ventral scales
primary_structure_color: dark olive to grey-brown with darker crossbands on tail and body
key_differentiating_features: Fourth lower tooth visible when mouth closed
confusion_species_list: Crocodylus suchus (West African Crocodile - smaller, different range)
Mecistops cataphractus (Slender-snouted Crocodile - very narrow snout)
sexual_dimorphism_notes: Males grow significantly larger than females
